urls.title: Encouraging hate crime reporting - The role of law enforcement and
urls.description: This report examines why victims do not report bias-motivated incidents and the barriers that they face when reporting incidents through national crime reporting systems. By mapping existing practices that have a bearing on the victim‚Äôs experiences when reporting bias-motivated violence and harassment, it aims to provide evidence to support national efforts to encourage and facilitate reporting ‚Äì and ultimately assist Member States in delivering on their duties with regard to combating hate crime.
